title: Govt's efforts to make big tech companies accountable shouldn't be spun as 'anti-free speech': MoS IT - Moneycontrol
content: Govt's efforts to make big tech companies accountable shouldn't be spun as 'anti-free speech': MoS IT  Moneycontrol
description: The Minister of State for Electronics and Information Technology also hinted that the introduction of the Bill on Data Protection will be delayed because the government does not want to "rush into" making it into a law and then amend it later.
